article_text:
McAlester, OK (74501)

Today

Scattered showers and thunderstorms. A few storms may be severe. High 77F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%..

Tonight

Isolated thunderstorms during the evening. Cloudy skies after midnight. A few storms may be severe. Low 69F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

article_metadata.author: DAVID DISHMAN | STAFF WRITER

og.description: A proposal among Oklahoma legislators to slash Medicaid reimbursements by up to 25 percent creates difficult situations for healthcare providers and patients alike.
og.title: The Medicaid crisis and MRHC
